summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of North 37th Street, from Meridian Avenue to Woodlawn Avenue, all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 368 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
